Header.title: Find Your Dream Furniture
Header.paragraph:
Transform your living space into a sanctuary
 of style and comfort.

About.paragraph: Welcome to DEI CONSILIUM Furnitures, your distinguished source for exquisite imported furniture in Lagos, Nigeria. We believe that your living and working environments are more than just spaces; they are canvases for your life's story, demanding pieces that resonate with elegance, comfort, and enduring quality.

Testimonials.text: "Our living room has been completely transformed! The imported sofa we bought from DEI CONSILIUM Furnitures is not only stunning but incredibly comfortable. The quality is expectional, and their team made the whole process effortless. Highly recommend! "
Testimonials.name: Aisha M

Testimonials.text: "Finding the perfect office furniture was a breeze with DEI CONSILIUM Furnitures. Their unique selection and attention to detail helped us create a workspace that's both productive and stylish. Truly top-tier furniture and service in Lagos"
Testimonials.name: Kunle O.

Testimonials.text: "We absolutely love our new dining set! Itâ€™s elegant, sturdy,anld instantly became the heart of our home. DEI CONSILIUM Furnitures delivered exactly what we needed, on time and with great care. Fantastic quality and a beautiful addition."
Testimonials.name: Blessing E.

Contact.address: 127 Olojo Drive, Odumosu Plaza, Ojo, Lagos

Features.title: Quality Craftsmanship
Features.text: Furniture meticulously crafted from premium imported materials.

Features.title: Globally Sourced
Features.text: A collection handpicked by manufacturers worldwide.

Features.title: Design Consultation
Features.text: Guidance to help you find the furniture that complements your lifestyle.

Features.title: Seamless Delivery
Features.text: Enjoy a worry-free experience from our showroom to your home.
